main_definition: Pertaining to or involving the face, especially in relation to treatments or expressions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to facial features or treatment of the face
meanings_and_examples.example: I had a relaxing facial at my local spa.
Her facial expressions conveyed her emotions perfectly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A session of beauty treatments applied to the face
meanings_and_examples.example: She scheduled a deep-cleansing and hydrating facial every month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An act or instance where one's feelings are shown on their face
meanings_and_examples.example: His anger became evident in his reddened facial complexion.
